meanings.definition: Make a concerted or violent attack on.
meanings.sent1: The pirates were assailing the ship, trying to take control.
meanings.sent2: The army assailed the enemy camp under the cover of darkness.
meanings.sent3: The kids playfully assailed each other with water balloons.
meanings.sent4: The storm assailed the coastal town with fierce winds and heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The knight assailed the dragon with his sword, determined to defeat it.
